name: Froggie Follow
description:
The exciting, intriguing game of Frogs will keep you captivated right until the very end.  Don’t let the Hedgehogs win!  Hurl your red Frogs towards the enemy Hedgehogs to damage and kill the hedgehogs. 

Keep your mischievous Frogs corralled together and bring them with you along the journey to the end.  You will need to keep at least 5 Green Frogs alive at the end to win.

Bring your Frogs with you!

Controls:

Use the x key to herd your Red Frogs.

Use your z key to herd your Green Frogs.

The arrow keys move your Robot around. 

 

The front edge or your your flashlight comes with a leader light that distracts your Phroggies and helps direct them in front of you when you hold down the appropriate x or z key.  Use this to direct them ahead of you towards the end.  Be careful as they love to play and keep running off. 

There are hazards out there.  Make sure they don’t pass through passageways when the spikes are up or you will be pushing the R key to restart again.

At the end, bring at least 5 green frogs to the door to unlock it.

Credit for Sound Effects Goes to zapsplat.com
